name: Canyon Hunter Premium
description:
Run through the endless canyons and caves and shoot Zombies, Werewolves, Orcas and Bats using 4 kind of different weapons: Machete, Revolver, Shotgun and … Grenade Launcher! Wow!

Inspired by some best known endless runners and 3D shooting games.

Swipe to jump and slide. Drug to strafe and avoid obstacles such as rolling stones, pitfalls, holes and wooden timbers. Collect Crystals and choose your path between caves and canyons.

Tap to shoot. Aim zombie head to bring it down with one Revolver shot!

Choose your favorite weapon:

* Machete: endless ammo – dangerous for health!
* Revolver: you need 2 shots to kill a zombie unless you aim a zombie head!
* Shotgun: one shot kills 2 monsters
* Grenade Launcher: total mayhem for anything and anyone around 10 meters of grenade explosion! (except you of cause! :-) )

Watch your health! Every monster attack or meet with obstacle reduces your health by 10%.

Use Shop to buy Health packs and Weapon Ammo to keep running further and further…

Explore different worlds, canyon and hidden caves.


Features:

• perfect mix of endless 3D runner and 3D shooter

• built-in Tutorial

• first person shooting

• intuitive swipe, drug and touch controls

• endless game play

• 4 types of weapon with different characteristics

• total mayhem for the attacking monsters with Grenade Launcher!
